languages.text: Ambull uses its natural ability to sense vibrations thorugh earth to hunt and as a result is immune to Blinded effect.

traits.locale_text: Ambull uses its natural ability to sense vibrations thorugh earth to hunt and as a result is immune to Blinded effect.

languages.text: An ambull has the natural ability to navigate and hunt underground by detecting vibrations. As a result, it is immune to the blinded effect.
languages.original_text: Природа наделила амбуллов способностью ориентироваться под землей и охотиться, улавливая вибрацию. Поэтому амбуллы обладают иммунитетом к {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослеплению{/g}.

traits.locale_text: An ambull has a natural ability to navigate and hunt underground by detecting the vibration. As a result, it is immune to the blinded effect.
An ambull has the natural ability to navigate and hunt underground by detecting vibrations. As a result, it is immune to the blinded effect.
An ambull has the natural ability to navigate and hunt underground by detecting vibrations. As a result, it is immune to the blinded effect.

An ambull selects its priority target among those on loose ground (with the {g|f:05d5bc8b6f234521af42bc5f1050ee70}get off the ground!{/g} effect). It deals additional damage to any target on loose ground, even if the attack is dodged or parried.
Additionally, ambulls are immune to the blinded effect.

An ambull selects its priority target among those on loose ground (with the {g|f:05d5bc8b6f234521af42bc5f1050ee70}get off the ground!{/g} effect). It deals additional damage to any target on loose ground, even if the attack is dodged or parried.
Additionally, ambulls are immune to the blinded effect.

languages.text: Природа наделила амбуллов способностью ориентироваться под землей и охотиться, улавливая вибрацию. Поэтому амбуллы обладают иммунитетом к {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослеплению{/g}.
languages.original_text: An ambull has the natural ability to navigate and hunt underground by detecting vibrations. As a result, it is immune to the blinded effect.

traits.locale_text: Природа наделила амбуллов способностью ориентироваться под землей и охотиться, улавливая вибрацию. Поэтому амбуллы обладают иммунитетом к {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослеплению{/g}.
Природа наделила амбуллов способностью ориентироваться под землей и охотиться, улавливая вибрацию. Поэтому амбуллы обладают иммунитетом к {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослеплению{/g}.

languages.text: Ambullar, titreşimleri algılayarak yer altında gezinme ve avlanma konusunda doğal bir yeteneğe sahiptir. Bu nedenle de körleştiren etkilere karşı bağışıktırlar.
languages.original_text: An ambull has the natural ability to navigate and hunt underground by detecting vibrations. As a result, it is immune to the blinded effect.

traits.locale_text: Ambullar, titreşimleri algılayarak yer altında gezinme ve avlanma konusunda doğal bir yeteneğe sahiptir. Bu nedenle de körleştiren etkilere karşı bağışıktırlar.

languages.text: Un ambull posee la capacidad natural de desplazarse y cazar bajo tierra detectando vibraciones. En consecuencia, es inmune al efecto cegado.
languages.original_text: An ambull has the natural ability to navigate and hunt underground by detecting vibrations. As a result, it is immune to the blinded effect.

traits.locale_text: Un ambull posee la capacidad natural de desplazarse y cazar bajo tierra detectando vibraciones. En consecuencia, es inmune al efecto cegado.

languages.text: 蚁牛可以通过本能，通过地面的震颤寻找目标，进行捕猎。因此，蚁牛不会受“致盲”效果影响。
languages.original_text: An ambull has the natural ability to navigate and hunt underground by detecting vibrations. As a result, it is immune to the blinded effect.

traits.locale_text: 蚁牛可以通过本能，通过地面的震颤寻找目标，进行捕猎。因此，蚁牛不会受“致盲”效果影响。

languages.text: L'ambull est naturellement capable de se déplacer et de chasser sous terre en détectant les vibrations. Cette aptitude lui confère une immunité contre l'Aveuglement.
languages.original_text: An ambull has the natural ability to navigate and hunt underground by detecting vibrations. As a result, it is immune to the blinded effect.

traits.locale_text: L'ambull est naturellement capable de se déplacer et de chasser sous terre en détectant les vibrations. Cette aptitude lui confère une immunité contre l'Aveuglement.

languages.text: アンブルは、振動を感知して地中で迷わず、狩りをするアビリティを有する。結果として、盲目効果に耐性がある。
languages.original_text: An ambull has the natural ability to navigate and hunt underground by detecting vibrations. As a result, it is immune to the blinded effect.

traits.locale_text: アンブルは、振動を感知して地中で迷わず、狩りをするアビリティを有する。結果として、盲目効果に耐性がある。

languages.text: Ambullen haben die natürliche Fähigkeit, durch die Erkennung von Vibrationen unterirdisch zu navigieren und zu jagen. Aus diesem Grund sind sie gegen Geblendet-Effekte immun.
languages.original_text: An ambull has the natural ability to navigate and hunt underground by detecting vibrations. As a result, it is immune to the blinded effect.

traits.locale_text: Ambullen haben die natürliche Fähigkeit, durch die Erkennung von Vibrationen unterirdisch zu navigieren und zu jagen. Aus diesem Grund sind sie gegen Geblendet-Effekte immun.
